item.title: CVE-2024-23440|2024-02-13T15:01:12.248Z -- virusblokada -- vba32%20antivirus
item.description: Vba32 Antivirus v3.36.0 is vulnerable to an Arbitrary Memory Read vulnerability.Â The 0x22200B IOCTL code of the Vba32m64.sys driver allows to read up to 0x802 of memory from ar arbitrary user-supplied pointer.
